Chief Smith Lambert:
Sister Kaina name is Gizel van halter. In the veins Kaina not only flows through the blood of the Royal family. Gizel van halter... No, now she got married and became Gizel von Hellman. So sorry... But beautiful Gizel became a Vampire. One day, Cain went away, and when he returned, he saw that Gizel was a Vampire. He was inconsolable.
